column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Tofu traditionally absorbs the flavors of the foods it touches in a dish. Also
column2: please know that you can request "less salt" or "less oil" for any of our ramen dishes. Otherwise
column3: I'm pleased to know our service was good
column4: and that you were able to use the free parking garage. Thanks again
column5: and we hope to serve you again soon.
